result.name: Genetic Markers for Resistance to Gastrointestinal Nematode Infections for a Sustainable Florida Native Sheep Production
result.description: Animals used in the study belong to on commercial farm of Florida Native sheep located in Ocala, Florida. A total number of one hundred Florida Native sheep were genotyped with Capture Sequencing (Rapid Genomics, Gainesville, FL) and SNP data were derived from sequencing results.
result.center: University of Florida, Department of Animal Sciences
